document.full_text: a book about mimicry and camouflage in nature, art and warfare has won the 2011 warwick prize for writing, a biennial award open to any genre on a given theme. this year's chosen subject was color.
document.title: book on mimicry, camouflage wins uk warwick prize
lines_and_colors: a book about mimicry and camouflage in nature, art and warfare has won the 2011 warwick prize for writing, a biennial award open to any genre on a given theme. this year's chosen subject was color.
